tool_description: Creates customized medical history questionnaires based on patient demographics, chief complaint, and specialty requirements to gather comprehensive health information.

specialty_type.description: Medical specialty (primary_care, cardiology, orthopedics, gynecology, pediatrics, dermatology, neurology, psychiatry)

patient_age.description: Patient age in years for age-appropriate questions

language_preference.description: Preferred language for questionnaire (english, spanish, french)

previous_visits.description: Whether patient has previous visits to this practice

include_family_history.description: Whether to include family history questions

include_social_history.description: Whether to include social history questions

error_messages: Invalid patient ID: Patient must exist in the system before creating questionnaire.
Unsupported specialty: Use one of [primary_care, cardiology, orthopedics, gynecology, pediatrics, dermatology, neurology, psychiatry].
Invalid question categories: Categories must be from the approved medical history category list.
Age out of range: Patient age must be between 0 and 120 years.
Unsupported language: Language must be one of [english, spanish, french].
Invalid urgency level: Must be one of [routine, urgent, emergency].
Invalid completion time: Time must be between 5 and 60 minutes.
usage: Provide patient ID, specialty, and question categories to generate a customized medical history questionnaire. Adjust optional parameters based on visit context and patient needs.

questionnaire_id.description: Unique identifier for the generated questionnaire

question_count.description: Total number of questions in the questionnaire

questionnaire_url.description: URL for patient to access the questionnaire
